osvSchema.summary: spring-projects/spring-data-redis: Depending upon JCenter/Bintray as an artifact repository
osvSchema.details:
spring-projects/spring-data-redis: Depending upon JCenter/Bintray as an artifact repository

Using a deprecated artifact repository may eventually give attackers access for a supply chain attack.
This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in spring-projects/spring-data-redis version 2.5.0-RC1 by commit c547ba2b6cef01f3c47f34f80f0ee9269f0a4b2c. For more details please see the references link.
